views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11, 12 and 13

Use current time as a passcode. Differently from concurrence, this tweak offers a lot of features, including:

- Ability to use real passcode along with the fake passcode simultaneously
- Ability to shift the time by a specific number of minutes
- Ability to always show the time on status bar, even while locked!
- Ability to reverse the resulting passcode combination

And for users who chose a 6-digit passcode, you can append any 2 digits to the resulting combination, by default: 00.

Configure options from Settings

None of the settings requires a respring to take effect!

Source code available

Added arm64e support
- Time shifting option now actually adds/subtracts minutes instead of increasing the number. This removes all the limits and negative shifting is supported as well. Example: if previously time 23:59 + 1 minute would give passcode 2360 now it'll give 0000

- Added "Reset Settings" option which will set up the tweak as new in case something is corruped, maybe caused by the first versions released on my private repo, or in case the user wants to reset it.
